description: Manage Azure log analytics query pack.

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics query-pack create
commands.summary: Create a log analytics query pack.
examples: az monitor log-analytics query-pack create -g resourceGroup -n queryPackName --location eastus2

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics query-pack delete
commands.summary: Delete a log analytics query pack.
examples: az monitor log-analytics query-pack delete-g resourceGroup -n queryPackName

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics query-pack list
commands.summary: List of all log analytics query packs.
examples: az monitor log-analytics query-pack list -g resourceGroup

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics query-pack show
commands.summary: Show a log analytics query pack.
examples: az monitor log-analytics query-pack show -g resourceGroup -n queryPackName

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics query-pack update
commands.summary: Update a log analytics query pack.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics query-pack update [--add]
                                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--name]
                                           [--remove]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--set]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--tags]
examples: az monitor log-analytics query-pack update -g resourceGroupName -n queryPackName --tags label1=value1
